Posts.Content: Jul 25, 2017 11:21PM Malizabeth wrote: Hi All, So glad to have found this community, trying to get out of my head worrying and spend more time here understanding. I had surgery on 7/11- Lumpectomy and Sentinel Node removed. In the area where my sentinel node was removed I evidently have a build up of lymphatic fluid which has caused a painful lump unde\rneath the incision. I saw my surgeon yesterday and he says it will go down over time and wants to see me in 4 weeks. I'm not sure I can handle 4 weeks of this kind of pain. He's recommended I see a specific breast cancer physical therapist, which I am calling today. I'm also concerned about developing Lymphedema -which is incurable. Anyone else having these same issues? Suggestions?
Posts.Title: July 2017 Surgery kae_md99 53nancy
